synthesis_conditions.equipment: borosilicate tube (1.2 mm o.d., 20 cm length)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: three times with DMF, followed by dichloromethane
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: soaked in anhydrous dichloromethane (5 mL) for 8 h, replenished four times over 2 days, dried under a gentle stream of nitrogen
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: Caution advised due to toxicity of beryllium compounds and DMSO decomposition liberating toxic SO2 gas.
